Harry Freedman, an experienced pilot, who earns his living by transporting goods. 
He received another order and hit the road. One flew over the jungle, a strange 
thing happened and the plane crashed. Now Harry in one of these abnormal jungle.

The game world will be open to the research, the player will have to find food 
and weapons to protect themselves.
